page.title: 19A GOOLE CHILD'S MEALS
page.content: We all eat very well and have both quantity, quality and a good variety of{food}in comparison with many people both in Britain and the world. The{types}of food and pattern of meals we eat in our house obviously {change}with the seasons and during weekends and holidays. My family eats at least 2 salads a week during the summer and vegetables about 3 times a week. We eat chips on average about twice a week. People should eat a{balanced diet}to keep healthy. We don't eat many{foreign}dishes, apart from curry with rice unless we go abroad. Goole doesn't really have it's own{traditional}dish but Yorkshire Pudding and fish and chips are both eaten quite often. Mum prepares the food and does most of the{cooking}but sometimes I help.
